snippet: The NFL's powerful competition committee is recommending making permanent extra-point kick snaps from the 15-yard line, eliminating all chop blocks and ejecting a player for twice receiving certain unsportsmanlike conduct penalties in a game....
lead_paragraph: The NFL's powerful competition committee is recommending making permanent extra-point kick snaps from the 15-yard line, eliminating all chop blocks and ejecting a player for twice receiving certain unsportsmanlike conduct penalties in a game.

headline.main: Extra Point, Chop Block and Replay on NFL Owners' Agenda
headline.print_headline: Extra Point, Chop Block and Replay on NFL Owners' Agenda
